name: zadanie
description: This project shows how to create tabular data that includes pagination, ability to control number of rows rendered, user name filtering, and ascending and descending sorting in columns. To help with this project I have used: * React * Bootstrap * Webpack * package.json

scripts.dev: webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot

author: "Kelly Furness <kelly.n.waite@gmail.com> (http://kellyfurness.com)
